DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this observational study is to collect efficacy and safety data in diabetic patients with acute hyperglycemia using NovoRapid™ FlexPen™ as per normal clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of NovoRapid™ Flexpen™
DOC.criteria: Patients with diabetes mellitus (according to product labelling) Hypoglycaemia Hypersensitivity to insulin aspart or to any of the excipients (according to product labelling)
